entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. 70 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
